physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19 with consolidations in both lungs on radiology assessment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient deteriorated to respiratory insufficiency and required transfer to the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) for mechanical ventilation.
There was a rapid decrease in ALT and AST values following the discontinuation of remdesivir, resulting in normalization of liver enzyme levels.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient was discharged to a rehabilitation center and was able to restart normal daily activities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient improved overall, returning home two weeks after rehabilitation.
